/home/siwat/ESPMegaPRO3-library/AnalogIoT.cpp File Reference /home/siwat/ESPMegaPRO3-library/AnalogIoT.cpp
Implementation of the AnalogIoT class.
#include <AnalogIoT.hpp> Include dependency graph for AnalogIoT.cpp:
Detailed Description
Implementation of the AnalogIoT class.
This file contains the implementation of the AnalogIoT class, which provides functionality for handling analog input and output operations in an IoT system. The class allows for setting the state and value of digital-to-analog converters (DACs), as well as reading the value of analog-to-digital converters (ADCs). It also supports publishing the state and value of DACs and ADCs over MQTT.
